attributes.action: Dissolve the current parliament and CALL FOR A CLEAN GENERAL ELECTION IN 2016.
attributes.additional_details:
Britain has been in big economic, educational, health and social trouble since 2008. If sincere efforts are not started as soon as possible, leaving the country manipulated by groups of self interested parasites from all parties, one dreads what the future will hold.
It's time to think logically, rationally and sensibly and implement what's good to 99% of the British people. 
This may only happen if an INDEPENDENT NON PARTY Parliament and GOVERNMENT of decent experts, specialists and thinkers are brought in via a CLEAN and DECENT ELECTION.

https://www.facebook.com/groups/487911824711118/
attributes.background: CURRENT PARLIAMENT and GOVERNMENT are NOT TENABLE. Recent discovery of fraud election expenses of Conservative Party makes 7 May 2015 election NULL and VOID as confirmed by the pathetic performance of incumbent government on Budget, education Academies, Junior doctor's striKe to name a few.
